stories.user_story: As a SuperAdmin, I want to invite tenant admins so that tenant onboarding is controlled.
acceptance_tests: Invitation email sent with secure token scoped to tenant schema
Password policy enforced on first login
Role-based dashboard routing validated via integration tests

stories.user_story: As an Admin, I want automated schema creation so that each tenant stays isolated.
acceptance_tests: Provisioning job creates schema and seed data
Cross-tenant access blocked in unit/integration tests

stories.user_story: As a Teacher, I want to record attendance per class session so that records stay accurate.
As a Teacher, I want to schedule exams and publish grades so that students stay informed.
acceptance_tests: Students see grades only after publish flag

stories.user_story: As an Admin, I want to generate invoices and collect payments so that finances remain transparent.
As an Admin, I want to customize tenant branding so that the portal matches school identity.
